DOC.detailed_description: A prospective randomized study patient undergo laparoscopic sleeve gastrectomy 2012 2015 perform . Patients randomize use computerized simple randomization scheme 1:1:1 ratio 3 group : patient receive intravenous analgesia ( Group 1 ) , one receive intravenous analgesia associate epidural analgesia ( Group 2 ) patient receive intravenous analgesia associate port-sites infiltration bupivacaine . Pain quantification measure Visual Analogic Scale ( VAS ) , range 0 ( absence pain ) 10 ( unbearable pain ) evaluate 24 hour surgery .
